Reviews.Title: Review
Reviews.Author: BHULGAN
Reviews.Content: I was very pleased with the item. When the comments are mint condition and refurbished in brand new housing, it usually is anything but that. This was the exception. The phone was without a scratch and has performed as well as any "new" phone could be expected to do. From my experience, I would recommend this seller to others.

Reviews.Title: Great reception
Reviews.Author: Michael Glasser "mike g"
Reviews.Content: Big improvement over my prior verizon phone.Programs very intuitive and keyboard feel is great.Nice big screen and good with voice commands.Able to transfer service in minutes from my old phone thru verizons telephone service.Great phone for the price.

Reviews.Title: Piece of junk!
Reviews.Author: Jax
Reviews.Content: I was taken to the cleaners on this one. The phone was hap hazardly put together, the camera works occasionally, and the cover screws are missing already. If I could give it 0 stars I would. Don't buy from this buyer unless you want rppedoff.

Reviews.Title: I recommend
Reviews.Author: E.Carter
Reviews.Content: Phone is dependable. It does the job its bought for. I recommend this seller. Only reason it didnt get 5 stars is because battery life is not as long as it should be.

Reviews.Title: Phone did not work ...
Reviews.Author: S. Voth
Reviews.Content: This phone seemed fine at first, however it turned off for no apparent reason and would not hold a charge on the battery at all.  I returned it. Unhappy with this phone.

Reviews.Title: chipped paint/coding on phone
Reviews.Author: Judy M Ballard
Reviews.Content: the cell phone color/paint is chipping on the edges and i have not dropped the phone, normal use.  this phone was a "refurbish" phone which I was not aware of prior to ordering the phone.

Reviews.Title: Bad company (SCAMMERS)
Reviews.Author: consumerreport
Reviews.Content: I recieved my phone and charged it for 24 hours. The phone only lasted 2 hours before the battery died. The item also appeared scatched and damaged and was advertised as NEW, not like-new. I was essentially scammed by these people. They told me that I could not exchange it because they were out of stock (ya right, they just knew they couldn't get away with sending me another refurbished phone they advertise as NEW) Do not trust this company!

Reviews.Title: phone
Reviews.Author: kelli prussing
Reviews.Content: I did not last very long.  I had it for probably 1 year and the battery was shot.  I guess it was old and that maybe to be expected from an older model.

Reviews.Title: out dated
Reviews.Author: My thoughts
Reviews.Content: battery dies so quick and even if u dont go online with it u are charged cause for sum reason with a mistake press of button -  its good as an emergency phone for 5 mins.

Reviews.Title: cell phone
Reviews.Author: bcarp
Reviews.Content: Ship fast great replacement phone great price was skeptical at first but needed a phone cause lost mine in ocean at beach

Reviews.Title: It was very nice.
Reviews.Author: maritza
Reviews.Content: I like it very much but,  I  gave it away as a gift and that person was very happy with it.

Reviews.Title: Obviously Used
Reviews.Author: Mazgula
Reviews.Content: The phone I received was obviously used. The battery is already kaput. There's also some problem with the key backlighting, it makes a weird noise when it's on and I think it drains the battery a lot. Other than that, it's a good solid little brick of a phone and I do like it for its size and simplicity.Update: 7/5/13 - Phone is likely counterfeit, and is now failing, hard.

Reviews.Title: Razr V3m Cell Phone
Reviews.Author: Thomas E. Gurnack
Reviews.Content: It met my expectations,  I was able to transfer my phone very easily with verizon to this phone temporarily until my smartphone was fixed.  the battery did not last as long as I anticipated, however, my work had some dead razr that good double batteries with extended cases that did the job.  I missed my smartphone.

Reviews.Title: NOT WHAT I WAS LOOKING FOR
Reviews.Author: Sylvee-ah
Reviews.Content: JUST BECAREFUL WHEN YOU PURCHASE THESE FOR REPLACEMENTS. I ORDERED THE RAZR V3M IN ERROR NOT KNOWING I DIDNT NEED THE V3M.  MY FAULT.

Reviews.Title: Didn't get what was stated
Reviews.Author: dd2424
Reviews.Content: It says Verizon phone no contract, well it will work on Verizon but only some features. Come to find out the phones software was changed from another companies. We bright it in to Verizon and they confirmed it. Can not accept texts with images and can not send one out on it. Also the software relating to the Bluetooth will not all it to pair for hands free devices.

Reviews.Title: Poor Product
Reviews.Author: Meagan Schulz
Reviews.Content: The phone would not charge. And a new battery costs $50, more than I payed for the phone, definetly not worth it.

Reviews.Title: The good news is, this is a great phone, the bad news is.....
Reviews.Author: Bruce
Reviews.Content: I am giving ths product 5 stars based upon historical experience and customer satisfaction. We purchased this phone as a Christmas present for a family member, who previously owned a RAZR V3m. Over the years, thanks to the upgrade program from Verizon, the phone was ultimately replaced. Little did we know how much that phone would be missed (donated to Verizons used phone program). I went searching for a new RAZR V3m to replace the one that we had. Upon activating the phone through our cellular provider, the call quality was bad; static filled the calls.Verizon technical services at the local store said there was nothing they could do to fix it. The seller has agreed to accept a return on this product. That alone warrants the 5 star rating. I will not hesitate to order again from this seller.

Reviews.Title: Classic Razr
Reviews.Author: BookNerd
Reviews.Content: I just love this little phone. I know, it's a dinosaur but dang, if all you want is a durable, easy to use phone for text and calls it can't be beat.Be aware that if you buy any Verizon phone, it cannot be used with any other service, ever. Verizon has their phones built with no SIM., so be sure that you have their service if you buy one of their phones used

Reviews.Title: Oldie but goodie
Reviews.Author: Nicholas E Girardi
Reviews.Content: what a great phone.  this is the best flip phone ever.  thin enough for a front pocket.  big screen.  perfect for those who dont need a smart phone.

Reviews.Title: Motorala Razr v3m
Reviews.Author: Steve Fillmore
Reviews.Content: the product is fine for an old phone - I lost mine, and this is a good replacement until Verizon lets me get another one. Service was perfect!

Reviews.Title: working with Verizon
Reviews.Author: David
Reviews.Content: I ordered a Razr phone. It's old bute it is what I want. It will not work with Verizon so I amreturning it. I have ordered another phone that says it will work with Verizon. Will it really? They are very particular about this. I need to know if it's going to work or not. If not, I'll have to return it also. May I please hear from someone on this matter. Verizon will only tell me yes or no.Thank you,David Shulldshull@comcast.net

Reviews.Title: Great phone for a kid
Reviews.Author: Erin Kristoff
Reviews.Content: This phone is a wonderful starter phone.  I received the phone in a timely manner, and was able to get it set up without any hassle.  If I didn't have an iPhone, this would be my phone.  Great phone for the price.

Reviews.Title: Motorola v3m
Reviews.Author: carlos valle
Reviews.Content: the phone was mare than i excepted it came like if it was brand new had a clean esn an was easy to activate with my carrierit was worth what i paid for i denfinently will be buying from them again in the future

Reviews.Title: Functional Phone
Reviews.Author: Gelber78
Reviews.Content: Functional no nonsense phone is lightweight,as long as you dont need e-mail or internet it is just fine for the money

Reviews.Title: poor
Reviews.Author: Helen E. Speights
Reviews.Content: The phone was old and out of date. and my phone company couldnt activate it for me with the mordern equipment thats being used today.

Reviews.Title: Phone fine; Battery Not
Reviews.Author: steffAZ
Reviews.Content: Bought this as a replacement for my husband's cell that was stolen.  Phone is fine, but battery doesn't last.  Charged phone on Friday and by Sunday night it started to beep from a low battery.  Have only had phone about a month.  My phone which is over 3-1/2 years old still has an almost full charge.  And the only calls we made were to each other on Sunday and they were less than 5 minutes total.  Would have liked to know how long the battery would last.

Reviews.Title: OK phone
Reviews.Author: James Blanchard
Reviews.Content: Purchase price Ok phone works well, only big down fall about these older phone that they say you are saving money on is that some of the new one don't cost what they say you are savings and also the batteries on these older models only last about 7 to 8 hours.  This is my second refurb phone and the other had the same issue.  The out side glass case cracked 3 day after getting and it was stored in a case.

Reviews.Title: Great replacment
Reviews.Author: John Thorson
Reviews.Content: Phone came exactly as advertised and well before the expected due date.  A boon for those of us who only want a phone not a smart phone.

Reviews.Title: Motorola RAZR is a phone classic
Reviews.Author: R J Moncuse
Reviews.Content: I'm a 2G sort of fellow in a 4G world. This is the absolute best of the 2G equipment. But then I still like Edsels also.

Reviews.Title: was not unlocked.
Reviews.Author: poedad8
Reviews.Content: Could not use phone. when I received the Razor phone it was already activated with someone else number. Had too return the phone was unable too use.

Reviews.Title: Phone lasted 6 months
Reviews.Author: Olenavygoat
Reviews.Content: I hate this because I loved the RAZR and bought this one to replace my original. It was actually a higher end model but unfortunately the friggin things screen crapped out a 6 months.

Reviews.Title: Excellent service
Reviews.Author: Larry L Green
Reviews.Content: The phone was in perfect condition and was very easy to program for my Verizon account. The extras included made an ideal package would highly recommend this company

Reviews.Author: rr
Reviews.Content: The phone shipped fast and was cheap :] , but it should have been reset.  It still had all contacts and pics from the previous owner.... good thing i'm no psycho.  :P

Reviews.Title: I'd hoped to make this phone work ...
Reviews.Author: C. Furman
Reviews.Content: I'd hoped to make this phone work for me until my contract was up as my contract phone bit the dust and I didn't pay for a replacement plan with my contract.  It wouldn't hold a charge for more that a few hours.  Obviously couldn't rely on this one!

Reviews.Title: Perfect for me
Reviews.Author: Cowboy Chris
Reviews.Content: I've had a Razr for a long time and just didn't want to change. I love the flip design and the compact size. No complaints.

Reviews.Title: No luck buying used...TWICE
Reviews.Author: Marleen T McMillion
Reviews.Content: The first phone had display problems a few days after I started using it.  They did replace the phone promptly.  The replacement was good for about a month and then would not hold a charge for more than a half hour.  When plugging it into the charger, sometimes it registered that it was charging, other times it seemed to not make that connection at all.  I e-mailed them to find out if they had many issues with the Razr phones and got NO REPLY.  So I wasted $45 on a used phone and have since had to buy a NEW phone.

Reviews.Title: battery wont hold a charge
Reviews.Author: mike
Reviews.Content: i had this phone for a week i returned it i forget to put the charger in the box so i put a hole in the box and sliped it in they sent me a email and said they only got the charger. im done with amazon i lost $45.00 because of this

Reviews.Title: It's OK, nothing more
Reviews.Author: Sabre
Reviews.Content: It's an older phone, but I didn't want features other than simple phone communications. It does what's asked of it, and the call quality is very good on the Verizon network. However, things like the proprietary Motorola programming system and the charging port that is no longer the standard are sort of a pain. The price was right, although the remanufacturer didn't seem to put a new battery in it...the one that came with it has so short a life as to be unusable. Caveat emptor.

Reviews.Title: unfortunately did not hold charge...
Reviews.Author: J. Lee "Amazon Shopper"
Reviews.Content: .. had to return the phone.  it came with two batteries - i tried both but both batteries drained within an hour (no actual talk time)... i've used the phone before and it would have been a hold over until i could upgrade... i suppose if you received one w/ no issues - it would be fine.

Reviews.Title: questionable software
Reviews.Author: anne
Reviews.Content: This phone works fine and is definitely in good shape, but although they sent two batteries both have very low power retention. the software on the phone is definitely not the original either... it works fine and has no problems, but the interface is a bit clunky at times.

Reviews.Title: Refurbished phone
Reviews.Author: S. Lee
Reviews.Content: This refurbished phone barely lasted 2 months before it totally broke down and stopped turning on and charging. The price was cheap (~$70), but I though that it would last longer than that.

ProductInfo.Features:
This product has been carefully audited and is certified to be 100% functional.
This offer includes the following accessories 1. Battery 2. Battery Cover (if applicable) 3. Wall Charger
ProductInfo.Name: Motorola RAZR V3m Cell Phone for Verizon with No Contract
